definitions.definition: come to a resolution in the mind as a result of consideration.
examples: they decided to appoint someone else

definitions.definition: cause to come to a resolution.
examples: this business about the letter decided me

definitions.definition: make a choice from a number of alternatives.
examples: she had decided on her plan of action
synonyms: have in mind "she decided to become a writer"

definitions.definition: give a judgment concerning a matter or legal case.
examples: the courts decided in favor of the New York claimants
we must decide the fates of the people who headed the coup
synonyms: rule on "the court is to decide the case"

definitions.definition: resolve or settle (a question or contest).
examples: an exciting game was decided in a sudden-death overtime
synonyms: figure out "research to decide a variety of questions"
